name: dubai-sme-scraper
title: Dubai SME Business Scraper
description: A comprehensive Apify actor that scrapes Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) in Dubai from Google Maps, categorizes them, and exports data to CSV. Features advanced data processing, contact extraction, error handling, and production-ready scalability.

dataset.title: Dubai SME Business Data
dataset.description: Scraped business data from Google Maps including contact information, ratings, and business details
